unnormalised: I love reading athlete biographies! Especially ones about Indian athletes. Makes me feel so proud! Remember Milkha Singh, what a legend! He was from Punjab, right? And wasn't a movie made about him? Bhag Milkha Bhag! Maybe I'll read about PT Usha next. Or someone from the National Sports Institute, Patiala! They all seem so disciplined! Gotta find a good book now.
